title: Predictive Maintenance - Machine Status System
desc: HCP Is a major manufacturer of sheet metal pipe duct and fittings for the HVAC Market.  Many of our production machinery lacks the ability to report anything about how it is doing.  We need visibility into the process to monitor operational status and machine health.The project entails adding a network of sensors to measure critical parameters of machine operations.  This will be different for each machine.  That data must be automatically pulled into a database from where it can be queried and and analyzed both in real time and over an extended period if time.the package must have a mobile reporting feature so operational supervisors can see the status of the equipment and its pace.  The analysis program must provide for scaling and filtering the data.Graphic Human Interface.Network must be scalable across an entire plant and for multiple locationsSee the attached project description for more info.
